Package main.java.view

Interface IView

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TextView
    public interface IView
    This interface represents the view part of the MVC architecture for portfolio management application. View is responsible for showing the output to the User. View formats the data received from the controller into a human-readable format.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void createPortfolioTable​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> listOfPortfolio)
      This method displays the portfolio table in a formatted output to the user.
      void displayGraph​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> graphOutput)
      This method displays the graph output.
      void displayText​(java.lang.String text)
      This method displays the string received from the controller to the user.
      void getPortfolioComposition​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> listOfStocks)
      This method displays the portfolio composition to the user in a formatted output.
      void showStockResponseWrapper​(StockPriceResponseWrapper response, java.time.LocalDate inputDate)
      This method displays the portfolio value in a formatted output.

    • Method Detail

      • displayText

        void displayText​(java.lang.String text)
        This method displays the string received from the controller to the user.
        Parameters:
        text - text string that needs to be displayed in the view.

      • createPortfolioTable

        void createPortfolioTable​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> listOfPortfolio)
        This method displays the portfolio table in a formatted output to the user.
        Parameters:
        listOfPortfolio - List of strings, wherein each string contains a portfolioName and the date of creation.

      • showStockResponseWrapper

        void showStockResponseWrapper​(StockPriceResponseWrapper response,
                              java.time.LocalDate inputDate)
        This method displays the portfolio value in a formatted output.
        Parameters:
        response - StockPriceResponseWrapper object which internally has successList consisting of portfolio stocks and its value at a currentDate...along with it failure stocks for which price retrieval failed
        inputDate - date for which the portfolio value is being displayed

      • getPortfolioComposition

        void getPortfolioComposition​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> listOfStocks)
        This method displays the portfolio composition to the user in a formatted output.
        Parameters:
        listOfStocks - list of strings, where each string represent the stock information like symbol, Quantity, name etc.

      • displayGraph

        void displayGraph​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> graphOutput)
        This method displays the graph output.
        Parameters:
        graphOutput - list of strings wherein each string in the list has the following information 1. Scale of the time 2. The normalized price 3. The actual price that needs to be displayed
